metadata.title: SediaBoiler - Ready-Made Foundation, Smooth Coding
metadata.description: Ready-to-use UI component library with copy-paste code for Next.js and Tailwind CSS

hero.title: Ready-Made Foundation,
hero.description: Comprehensive collection of ready-to-use templates and UI components. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to speed up your development workflows.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

installation.question: Do I need to install a package?
installation.answer: No. SediaBoiler is a copy-paste library. You simply copy the raw code directly into your project. No heavy dependencies or vendor lock-in.

tech_stack.question: What specific technologies are inside?
tech_stack.answer: Built on the bleeding edge: Next.js 14 (App Router), Tailwind CSS v3.4, TypeScript 5, Supabase, and specialized accessible components.

license.question: Can I sell projects I build with this?
license.answer: Absolutely. The code is yours. Build SaaS products, client websites, or internal tools and sell them unlimitedly. No royalties, no strings attached.

customization.question: Can I customize the components?
customization.answer: Yes! Since the code lives in your project, you have full control. You can modify any Tailwind class or logic to fit your specific brand.

roadmap.question: Are more components coming?
roadmap.answer: Yes! We ship new UI blocks (Dashboards, Forms, Sections) every week based on user requests. Your boilerplate grows with you.

features.title: Why SediaBoiler?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build modern websites quickly
features.creativeSubtitle: An experience designed to make you ship faster, not just a template.

copyPaste.title: Instant Copy-Paste
copyPaste.description: Copy JSX/Tailwind code with a single click. No complicated setup required.

responsive.title: Responsive by Default
responsive.description: All components are optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Documentation
bilingual.description: Complete descriptions in Indonesian and English.

modern.title: Modern Design
modern.description: Components with clean and professional design for SaaS, landing pages, and dashboards.

customizable.title: Easy to Customize
customizable.description: Built with Tailwind CSS for easy color and styling customization.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Use for commercial or personal projects without restrictions.

library.title: Component Library
library.subtitle: Explore our collection of ready-to-use UI components

footer.description: Ready-to-use UI component library for Indonesian developers.
